name: Gunswinger 2022
description:
RECOMMENDED DOWNLOAD STANDALONE

Gunswinger
A wild-west dungeon crawler where you can curve your bullets! Progress through the game by shooting enemies, picking up item drops, and blasting epic tunes on your saxophone!

Controls:
- Use WASD to move the player.
- Left click to shoot.
- Right click to dash.
- Reload your gun by spinning the mouse around the player

Credits:
Oliver B - Producer/Mechanics/Art/Animation
Blake R - Enemy AI /Game Systems/Visuals
Rohit S - User Experience/Testing
Chandler S - Level Design/Particles
Aram C - Sound Design/Music
